title: PM Shehbaz meets MNAs to discuss constituency matters, national affairs
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 19 (APP):Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Thursday held separate meetings with Members of the National Assembly (MNAs) Nadeem Abbas Rebaira, Anwarul Haq Chaudhry, Muhammad Shehbaz Babar, Ahmad Atiq Anwar, and Rana Iradat Sharif here at the Prime Minister’s Office.
The discussions focused on constituency-related matters and the overall political and national situation of the country, a Prime Minister’s Office news release said.
Federal Minister for Public Affairs Unit Rana Mubashir Iqbal, Minister of State for Power Division Abdul Rehman Kanju, and Special Assistant to the Prime Minister Talha Burki were also present during the meetings.
